segments.text: Good morning , I am here for my interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , nice to meet you . I ’ m Mr . Gotcha . Have any trouble finding the place ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So why don ’ t you tell me why you are interested in changing positions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Unfortunately , our company is shutting down due to the economy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What would you consider your strengths ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am probably best at researching for marketing purposes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I tend to get bored easily and so love to keep myself challenged .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a position where that could work out well .
segments.speaker: S2
